title: Ecuador Interbank Weighted Average Rate
description: Ecuador Interbank Weighted Average Rate was at 260 percent on Wednesday November 9. Interbank Rate in Ecuador averaged 2.54 percent from 2000 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 260 percent in October of 2022 and a record low of 0.11 percent in April of 2010. In Ecuador, the interbank rate is the rate of interest charged on short-term loans made between banks. The interbank rate for Ecuador consists of a weighted average of the minimum and maximum interbank rates. This page provides - Ecuador Standard Interbank Rate - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Banco Central del Ecuador
